data.mObtainable_way:
1. Has a 100% chance to be in stock in Sam's Shop. A user can purchase a seed for 10 Coins or 7 Roblux.
2. Lucky Harvest
3. Red Fox steal
4. Snail, yield a seed when harvest
5. Dog and Golden Lab dig up
data.mTrivia:
This is the first crop that anyone can plant and buy in-game
.The Carrot takes about 6.5 seconds to fully grow, which is really quick
.The Easter Event 2025 variant of this crop is the Chocolate Carrot
.The Carrot can be eaten by a Bunny and the Black Bunny.

3. Lucky Harvest
4. Red Fox steal
5. Snail, yield a seed when harvest
6. Dog and Golden Lab dig up
data.mTrivia:
- Strawberry takes 85 seconds for the crop to grow and produces its berries in 5 to 8 seconds.
- A Strawberry's max wield is 4.
- In the past, buying a Strawberry seed for  21 would instead give you a Cherry Blossom seed. This is not possible anymore.

data.mTrivia:
- A Blueberry crop takes 105 seconds to fully grow, and one Blueberry takes approximately 22 seconds.
- A Blueberry's max yield is 8.
- The Blueberry is one of the three bush crops, the other two are Raspberry and Celestiberry.

data.mObtainable_way:
1. Has a 33.3% chance to be in stock in the Seed Shop. A user can purchase an Orange Tulip seed for 600 Coins or 14 Roblux.
2. Lucky Harvest
3. Red Fox steal
4. Snail, yield a seed when harvest
5. Dog and Golden Lab dig up
data.mTrivia:
- The Orange Tulip takes about 6 seconds to be fully grown.
- The Orange Tulip is one of the fastest crops to grow in the entire game.

data.mObtainable_way:
The Rose can be obtained by opening the Flower Seed Pack with a 40% chance.
It can't be bought from the Honey Shop as it is only obtainable from the Flower Seed
data.mTrivia: The model of the Rose bush is the same as the models used in the Celestiberry and Crimson Vine.

data.mObtainable_way: The Lavender seed can be obtained by purchasing it from the Honey Shop for a cost of 3 Honey. It is one of several seeds available through the Honey Shop and can be bought using Honey. The Lavender seed appears in quantities of 3 to 4 with a 100% chance per shop refresh, allowing multiple purchases during each cycle.

1. Has a 100% chance to be in stock in the Seed Shop. A user can purchase a seed for 800 Coins or 79 Roblux.
2. Lucky Harvest
3. Red Fox steal
4. Snail, yield a seed when harvest
5. Dog and Golden Lab dig up
data.mTrivia:
- A Tomato crop can grow extremely tall and can reach up to an average Coconut tree or higher. When this happens, some Tomatoes may become inaccessible because they are unable to be reached.
- The taller the Tomato crop is, the more Tomato it can grow on a crop.
- If a user sells a Tomato that weighs 7kg or greater, you will obtain the GIANT TOMATO badge.
- The Mushroom Seed is same as the Tomato Seed, but Mushroom has spots.

The Nectarshade seed can be obtained by purchasing it for  5 in the Queen Bee's shop.
data.mTrivia:
The picture of the Nectarshade seed appears green in the Event Shop, but it has a brown to orange gradient in-game.
The Nectarshade seed resembles the Cacao seed, having a light color scheme then the Cacao.
The Nectarshade initially didn't exist in the Bizzy Bee Event; this is because it was later added in the update expansion on June 7th. Note that Nectarshades are much smaller than they may look.

data.mObtainable_way:
1. Normal Seed Pack
2. Basic Seed Pack
data.mTrivia:
- The Raspberry is one of two bush-type crops in the game. The other one is Blueberry.
- This crop's rarity used to be mythical. It was changed to rare during the Angry Plant Event update.

data.mObtainable_way: The Pear seed can be obtained from the Normal Seed Pack.
The Mint is obtainable in the Night Seed Pack with a 22% chance.
The Foxglove seed can be obtained exclusively in the Honey Shop by the Flower Seed Pack with a 25% chance.

data.mTrivia:
- The Bamboo is the most common legendary seed found in Sam's Shop.
- The Bamboo can be used as a ladder for tall or overgrown crops.
- If a bamboo gets zombified, it will reveal the hidden truss that allows you to climb it.

data.mObtainable_way: The Moonflower can be obtainable in the Night Seed Pack for 199 Honey per pack or for free with an 18% chance.
data.mTrivia: The Moonflower may be used as a ladder, similar to Tomato and Bamboo.

- The Cactus crop generally grows taller than a user's avatar.
- Having active (Blood) Hedgehogs multiplies the crops' weight

data.mTrivia: A Mango crop takes about eight minutes to fully grow and produces a mango every two minutes.

data.mObtainable_way:
The Nectarine is a limited-time Mythical crop introduced during the Bizzy Bee Event.
The Nectarine has a minimum value of  36,100.
The Nectarine seed can be obtained exclusively from the Honey Shop by trading 25 Honey, which is produced by submitting 30 kg of pollinated crops into the Honey Compressor.
Alternatively, it can be purchased for 399 Roblux.
data.mTrivia:
The Nectarine tree is quite small, however it produces up to 10 fruits.
The Nectarine fruit has the same model as the Peach, but more orange and with a wider middle part.

data.mObtainable_way: A Peach seed can be obtained from a Normal Seed Pack.
data.mTrivia:
- If a peach tree overgrows, the number of fruits produced will increase.
- The peach plant is exclusive to the normal seed pack

data.mObtainable_way: A Pineapple seed can be obtained from a Normal Seed Pack.
data.mTrivia: Pineapple, along with Raspberry, Peach, and Pear, are the only crops exclusive to the Normal Seed Pack.

data.mObtainable_way:
The Pink Lily is a limited mythical multi-harvest crop added during the Bizzy Bee Event. It produces one crop at a time.
used to be worth 100k but was quickly nerfed
The Pink Lily seed has a 10% chance of being obtained from the Flower Seed Pack.
data.mTrivia: The Pink Lily flower's colors can be different types of pink.

data.mObtainable_way: Has a 4.5% chance, making it the 2nd rarest plant to be rolled from the Flower Seed Pack, which can be purchased for 10 Honey with 4.5 %.
data.mTrivia:
The Purple Dahliaâ€™s appearance and name are inspired by the real-world dahlia flower, which is known for its variety of vibrant colors and intricate petal patterns.
The Purple Dahlia is a slow growing crop.
The Purple Dahlia grows up to 4 flowers at a time.
The Purple Dahlia's flower closely resembles the Lotus flower in appearance.
The Purple Dahlia is multi-harvestable.
The Purple Dahlia's base value is around 60~90K sheckles.
The Purple Dahlia average kg is around 11kg.
The Purple Dahlia seed chance is broken.

data.mObtainable_way:
Grape seed can be obtained by the following ways: A user can purchase a seed for  850,000 Coins or  599 Roblux.
1. Lucky Harvest
2. Red Fox steal
3. Snail, yield a seed when harvest
4. Dog and Golden Lab dig up
data.mTrivia:
- The Grape, the Mushroom, the Pepper, and the Cacao are currently the only non-limited Divine crops.
- There was once a bug where the Grape could not mutate as shocked. This was patched in an update.
- An overgrown Grape vine can enter another player's garden.
- Currently, the Grape in a user's does not display the mutation types applied to the Grape. This does not impact the selling value.

data.mObtainable_way:

2. Lucky Harvest.
3. Red Fox steal.
4. Snail, yield a seed when harvest.
5. Dog and Golden Lab dig up.
data.mTrivia:
- The various colors of the Mushroom do not affect the Mushroom's sell value in any way.
- All colors of the Mushroom are equally common, meaning that there are no rare Mushroom colors.

data.mTrivia: The pepper fruit is the first fruit that has special physical effects without mutations.

The Hive Fruit is a limited-time divine crop which was introduced in the Bizzy Bee Event in Grow a Garden.
The Hive Fruit seed can be obtained exclusively from the Honey Shop by trading.
data.mTrivia:
Its unique tree structure requires strategic garden planning to maximize yield.
When the pollinated mutation is applied to a Hive Fruit it has a chance to send out bees which can in turn pollinate other crops.
It is one of the 2 plants that are purchasable in the Honey Shop.
The Hive Fruit originally had a minimum value of  4,500 Sheckles before being buffed to around  45,000 Sheckles two days after release.

data.mObtainable_way:
The Sunflower is a limited divine multi-harvest crop introduced during the Bizzy Bee Event in Grow a Garden.
It grows one piece of produce at a time. It is currently the rarest obtainable seed from the Flower Seed Pack.
The Sunflower seed can be obtained at a 0.5% chance from the Flower Seed Pack, which can be purchased from the Honey Shop with  10 Honey or  199 Roblux.
data.mTrivia:
The Sunflower is the second type of sunflower in the game, the first one being Candy Sunflower.
The Sunflower fruit takes approximately 30 minutes to grow.
The Sunflower seed is visually very similar to both the Pumpkin and the Mango seeds, being a similar shade of light orange.
Upon release, the Sunflower had the highest base price in the game at 200,000, but was reduced down to 135,000, on par with the pre-nerf Moon Mango and the Mushroom respectively.

data.mObtainable_way: The Beanstalk seed can be purchased for  10,000,000 or  715 from the Seed Shop.
data.mTrivia:
The Beanstalk was the first Prismatic crop to be released in-game.
- There was a bug when the Beanstalk was first released, where if a player purchased it with Robux, it would instead give them a Dragon Fruit seed.
- The in-game Beanstalk is very similar in appearance to the titular beanstalk from Jack and The Beanstalk, being large spiraling plants that sprout podded beans.
- The chance to be in the Seed Shop is 1/3,333. (0.03%)

data.mObtainable_way:
The Ember Lily seed can be obtained by:
Purchasing for 15,000,000 Coins or 779 Roblux in the Seed Shop.
Lucky Harvest
Stolen by a Red Fox
Snail, yield a seed when harvest
Rarely dug up by a Dog or Golden Lab
Rarely gotten from the Super Seed
data.mTrivia:
The Ember Lily is one of the two Prismatic crops in the game.
The Ember Lily seed has the 2nd highest cost to purchase, behind Moon Mango and tied with Celestiberry.
The Ember Lily's appearance is based on the real-life Ember Lily flower.
The chance to be in the Seed Shop is 1/5.000 (0.02%) - which means a predicted 1 to 2 in-stock every day.
There is a bug where the Red Fox cannot steal an Ember Lily Seed, even though it is a Seed Shop item.
The Ember Lilies have a kg average of 10.60 kg
